title: (x) California script - (similar to) Zapfino {Patricia, Lex}
content:
Hi!

Please identify this font (or fonts?).

Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121231211814im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Ca_Noodles_3525.jpg)
author: misalion

comments.content: I was gonna say Zapfino but it isn't, quite.

The lowercase looks like Zapfino One to me.

- Lex

The 'C' looks almost like Brush Script.

- Lex

Like Lex says, I think this began as [Zapfino](http://web.archive.org/web/20121231211814/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/zapfino_extra_pro_ot_virtual/?sample_text=California&sample_size=96). It's too close.
